00024 #ifndef KERNELS_H
00025 #define KERNELS_H
00026 
00027 #include <complex.h>
00028 
00034 double _Complex gaussian(double x, int der, const double *param);              /* K(x)=exp(-x^2/c^2) */
00035 double _Complex multiquadric(double x, int der, const double *param);          /* K(x)=sqrt(x^2+c^2) */
00036 double _Complex inverse_multiquadric(double x, int der, const double *param);  /* K(x)=1/sqrt(x^2+c^2) */
00037 double _Complex logarithm(double x, int der, const double *param);             /* K(x)=log |x| */
00038 double _Complex thinplate_spline(double x, int der, const double *param);      /* K(x) = x^2 log |x| */
00039 double _Complex one_over_square(double x, int der, const double *param);       /* K(x) = 1/x^2 */
00040 double _Complex one_over_modulus(double x, int der, const double *param);      /* K(x) = 1/|x| */
00041 double _Complex one_over_x(double x, int der, const double *param);            /* K(x) = 1/x */
00042 double _Complex inverse_multiquadric3(double x, int der, const double *param); /* K(x) = 1/sqrt(x^2+c^2)^3 */
00043 double _Complex sinc_kernel(double x, int der, const double *param);           /* K(x) = sin(cx)/x */
00044 double _Complex cosc(double x, int der, const double *param);                  /* K(x) = cos(cx)/x */
00045 double _Complex kcot(double x, int der, const double *param);                   /* K(x) = cot(cx) */
00046 double _Complex one_over_cube(double x, int der, const double *param);                /* K(x) = 1/x^3 */
00047 /* \} */
